ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.2_0: At that time a number of nuns who had completed the rainy-season residence in a village monastery went to Sāvatthī.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.4_0: “Venerables, where did you spend the rains residence?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.5_0: Where did you invite the Sangha of monks for correction?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.6_0: “Venerables, we don’t do the invitation procedure with the Sangha of monks.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.8_0: “How can nuns who have completed the rains residence not invite the Sangha of monks for correction?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns didn’t do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.12_0: “... How could nuns not do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.14_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:1.15.1_0: ‘If a nun who has completed the rainy-season residence does not invite correction from both Sanghas in regard to three things—what has been seen, what has been heard, and what has been suspected—she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.1.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.1.5_0: Who has completed the rainy-season residence:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.1.6_0: who has completed the first three or the last three months of the rainy-season residence.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.1.7_0: If she thinks, “I won’t invite correction from both Sanghas in regard to three things—what has been seen, heard, or suspected,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.2.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.2.3_0: if she searches, but does not find anyone to invite for correction;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.2.8_0: The seventh training rule is finished.
